item.title: Introduction to Findings
item.description: Findings are the main way that DefectDojo standardizes and guides the reporting and remediation process of your security tools. Regardless of whether a vulnerability was reported in SonarQube, Acunetix, or your teamâ€™s custom tool, Findings give you the ability to manage each vulnerability in the same way.
